content: Layer homemade parfait. In a jar, glass, or bowl, layer the Greek yogurt, fruit, honey (if using), and granola. TIP: If you want your plain Greek yogurt parfait to have two layers, simply use half of the amounts (listed in the recipe card) and alternate layers of fruit with the yogurt and granola.

Matching eggs with avocado is a winning choice at the table and not only because it tastes amazing. This combination, in addition to being versatile and done in the right way, ensures numerous nutritional benefits to stay fit and healthy.
